On 19/04/07, ahmed ghouzia <ghouzia@...> wrote:
> I need to add a new processor to  heritrix  and  I think the following are the required steps:
>
> 1- Get a heritix source version
> 2- Modify the Processor.options file located in /src/conf/modules .
> 3- Add the new processor file ( e.g  newProcessor.java) to the folder
>      /src/java/org/archive/extractor .
> 4- Rebuild heritrix from source using maven.
>
> Are these steps correct ?

Yes, but too complicated.

All you need is to put your implementation as a jar into heritrix/lib folder.
And be sure you have in your jar "modules/Processor.options" where you
specify your processor(s).

Heritrix will pick it up from there, you may have multiple jars, each
with its own options file.

Cheers,
-- 
Laurian Gridinoc, purl.org/net/laur
